column1: Dr. '''Elizabeth Solopova''' is Research Fellow at the Faculty of English at the [[University of Oxford]]
column2: specialising in research on medieval manuscripts (the [[Wikipedia:Wycliffe's Bible|Wycliffite Bible]]
column6: and works in the Department of Special Collections and Western Manuscripts at the [[Bodleian Library]].<ref>[http://www.english.ox.ac.uk/about-faculty/faculty-members/research-centre-college-staff/solopova-dr-elizabeth Solopova
column7: Dr Elizabeth] at [http://www.english.ox.ac.uk/ Faculty of English (Oxford)] (accessed 22 September 2011)</ref><ref>[http://us.macmillan.com/author/elizabethsolopova Elizabeth Solopova] at [http://us.macmillan.com/default.aspx MacMillan.com] (accessed 22 September 2011)</ref>
